title: Desirable Townhouse
posting_body: One of two townhouses in building set back from street convenient to major routes.
Attached one car garage and storage on first floor.
Bedroom, bathroom, living room, eat-in-kitchen on second floor.
625 square feet large (does not include garage and storage area).
Kitchen has electric stove, dishwasher, standard-size refrigerator, washer and dryer.
Landlord responsible for water and sewer and for snow-removal on driveway; tenant responsible for snow-removal on steps.
First and last month rent and half month rent for security deposit.
Open house: Sunday 7 from 10:00 a.m. to 4:00 p.m. and on Saturday 13 from 10:00 a.m. to 4:00 p.m. Viewing during week days only by appointment.
